items.sentence: Tom lives alone in the mountains. No one has seen him for years.
Tom stopped kissing Mary as soon as he saw John staring at them.
I'm going shopping this afternoon. Would you like to come along?
Many passengers from the ship that sank never reached the shore.
Everyone's too busy scamming each other to save the environment.
It's freezing in here. Can someone turn off the air conditioner?
On my way to school every day, I usually see many dogs and cats.
I keep a good supply of stamps to save trips to the post office.
His father died, and to make matters worse, his mother fell ill.
What did Tom have in mind when he said that we're two of a kind?
